title: Serif book cover font?
content:
Pistilli? Bodoni?

Font: 

 Didi/Domani

comments.content:
It looks like **[Didi](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162639/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Image-Club-Graphics&ffam=Didi%20-%20Regular&fid=597e59c0be4a54b2bca4e1f5dbb38024&fsize=60&text=Gogh%20Rizi%20Cano&wrap=2)**, originally designed by Herb Lubalin and Tom Carnase and published in digital form by Image Club Graphics [1992].  
Also revived as **[Domani](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162639/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/counterpoint/domani-cp/)** by CounterPoint Type Studio [2013]
